# Mediabunny

> Complete media toolkit

A JavaScript library for reading, writing, and converting video and audio files. Directly in the browser, and faster than anybunny else.

## Table of Contents

### Getting started

- [Introduction](/guide/introduction.md)
- [Installation](/guide/installation.md)
- [Quick start](/guide/quick-start.md)

### Reading

- [Reading media files](/guide/reading-media-files.md)
- [Media sinks](/guide/media-sinks.md)
- [Input formats](/guide/input-formats.md)

### Writing

- [Writing media files](/guide/writing-media-files.md)
- [Media sources](/guide/media-sources.md)
- [Output formats](/guide/output-formats.md)

### Conversion

- [Converting media files](/guide/converting-media-files.md)

### Miscellaneous

- [Packets & samples](/guide/packets-and-samples.md)
- [Supported formats & codecs](/guide/supported-formats-and-codecs.md)

### Extensions

- [@mediabunny/mp3-encoder](/guide/extensions/mp3-encoder.md)


















### Other

- [Examples](/examples.md)
